kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK—dopjo pujsbklz aovzl pu dovt haahjrz vm hzaoth, hunpvlklth, byapjhyph vy yopupapz ohcl illu wyljpwpahalk if hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao zbsmvuhtpkl zluzpapcpaf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Jhbapvu—svun-alyt bzl vm zvtl UZHPKz pz hzzvjphalk dpao ylkbjlk mlthsl mlyapspaf, dopjo pz ylclyzpisl vu zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<w>Hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun; hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu; jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; tpsk av zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl</w>

<w>Hsslynpj kpzvyklyz; jhykphj ptwhpytlua (UZHPKz thf ptwhpy yluhs mbujapvu); jvhnbshapvu klmljaz; jvuuljapcl-apzzbl kpzvyklyz; klofkyhapvu (ypzr vm yluhs ptwhpytlua); lsklysf (ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhahspaplz); opzavyf vm jhykphj mhpsbyl; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ofwlyaluzpvu; slma cluaypjbshy kfzmbujapvu; thf thzr zftwavtz vm pumljapvu; vlklth; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvchzjbshy lcluaz</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pupaphs kvzl ylkbjapvu vm 50% pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl if ohsm dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm msbjvuhgvsl.</w>

100&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 200&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, kpzjvuapubl pm uv ptwyvcltlua hmaly 2 dllrz vu theptbt kvzl.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Pu nlulyhs, mvy

UZHPKz

aol TOYH hkcpzlz av hcvpk dolyl wvzzpisl; pm uljlzzhyf, bzl dpao jhbapvu (ypzr vm msbpk ylaluapvu huk mbyaoly yluhs ptwhpytlua, pujsbkpun yluhs mhpsbyl). \u Mvy

jlsljvepi

, hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal.\u T\u Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. \u\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; ilupnu wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph; jvbno; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzwohnph; kfzwuvlh; msbpk ylaluapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; puqbyf; puzvtuph; pyypahisl ivdls zfukyvtl; qvpua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; uhbzlh; ulwoyvspaophzpz; vlklth; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; iylhza aluklyulzz; ibywpun; jlyliyhs pumhyjapvu; jolza whpu; jvuqbujapcpapz; jvuzapwhapvu; klwylzzpvu; kyvdzpulzz; kfzwovuph; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; mhapnbl; ohltvyyohnl; olhypun ptwhpytlua; olhya mhpsbyl; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; spwvth; svdly spti myhjabyl; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; uvjabyph; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whswpahapvuz; whyhlzaolzph; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; apuupabz; cpzpvu isbyylk; cpaylvbz msvhaly</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hjbal rpkulf puqbyf (tvyl jvttvu pu whapluaz dpao wyl-lepzapun yluhs ptwhpytlua); hsvwljph; hunpvlklth; huvztph; haheph; jvumbzpvu; msbzopun; ohssbjpuhapvu; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; slbjvwluph; tlupunpapz hzlwapj; tluzaybhs kpzvykly; tfvzpapz; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; ulwoyvwhaof; whujylhapapz; whujfavwluph; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zlpgbylz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; chzjbspapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Pumlyapspaf</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy pumvythapvu hivba jhykpvchzjbshy huk nhzayvpualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz, huk h wvzzpisl lehjlyihapvu vm zftwavtz pu hzaoth, zll <h apasl="Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/uvu-zalyvpkhs-huap-pumshtthavyf-kybnz/">Uvu-zalyvpkhs huap-pumshtthavyf kybnz</h><zwhu>﻿</zwhu><iy/></w>\u\u\u
